00026     function PRAYFile($reader=null) {
00027         $this->blocks = array();
00028         if($reader instanceof IReader) {
00029             $this->reader = $reader;
00030             $this->Parse();
00031         } else {
00032             $this->parsed = true; //make sure no one tries to parse it...
00033         }
00034     }
00035 
00037 
00039     private function Parse() {
00040         if(!$this->parsed) {
00041             if($this->ParseHeader()) {
00042                 while($this->ParseBlockHeader()) {
00043                 }
00044                 $this->parsed = true;
00045                 //print_r($this->blocks);
00046                 return $this->blocks;
00047             } else {
00048                 echo "Failed at block header: NOT A PRAY FILE";
00049                 return FALSE;
00050             }
00051         }
00052 
00053         return $this->blocks;
00054     }

00062     public function Compile() {
00063         $compiled = 'PRAY';
00064         foreach($this->blocks as $block) {
00065             $compiled .= $block->Compile();
00066         }
00067         return $compiled;
00068     }

00075         //TODO: Check block name is unique (in blocks of the same type).

00087     public function GetBlocks($type=FALSE) { //gets all blocks or one type of block
00088         if(!$type) {
00089             return $this->blocks;
00090         } else {
00091             if(is_string($type)) {
00092                 $type = array($type);
00093             }
00094             $retblocks = array();
00095             foreach($this->blocks as $block) {
00096                 if(in_array($block->GetType(),$type)) {
00097                     $retblocks[] = $block;
00098                 }
00099             }
00100             return $retblocks;
00101         }
00102     }

00109     public function GetBlockByName($name) {
00110         foreach($this->blocks as $blockid => $block) {
00111 
00112             if($block->GetName() == $name) {
00113                 return $block;
00114             }
00115         }
00116         return null;
00117     }

00125     private function ParseHeader() {
00126         if($this->reader->Read(4) == "PRAY") {
00127             return true;
00128         } else {
00129             return false;
00130         }
00131     }
00132 
00134 
00140     private function ParseBlockHeader() {
00141         $blocktype = $this->reader->Read(4);
00142         if($blocktype=="") {
00143             return false;
00144         }
00145         $name = trim($this->reader->Read(128));
00146         if($name=="") {
00147             return false;
00148         }
00149         $length = $this->reader->ReadInt(4);
00150         if($length===false) {
00151             return false;
00152         }
00153         $fulllength = $this->reader->ReadInt(4); //full means uncompressed
00154         if($fulllength===false) {
00155             return false;
00156         }
00157         $flags = $this->reader->ReadInt(4);
00158         if($flags===false) {
00159             return false;
00160         }
00161 
00162         $content = $this->reader->Read($length);
00163         $this->blocks[] = PrayBlock::MakePrayBlock($blocktype,$this,$name,$content,$flags);
00164 
00165         return true;
00166     }
